PAD_Victory.synopsis: Players defeated Adamantine construct. They shout out in triumph.

PAD_HammerHit.synopsis: Player successfully damaged the golem with the hammer.

PAD_Mephits.synopsis: Mephits just appeared in the middle of the Adamantine Golem fight. Party cries out.

PAD_HammerFail.synopsis: Combat against the golem has begun. Player hit the golem with the giant hammer, but did no damage.

PAD_Victory_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Victory_0.text: Victory is mine. The guardian's fallen!
PAD_Victory_0.context: NodeContext: VLAH-kith TAHV-key nah-ZINN. Vlaakith, show us truth!

PAD_HammerHit_0.speaker: Player
PAD_HammerHit_0.text: Damn - by the Nine Hells, it worked!

PAD_Mephits_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Mephits_0.text: Mephits? As if my hands weren't full already!

PAD_HammerFail_0.speaker: Player
PAD_HammerFail_0.text: Hells - not a lick of damage! What am I missing?
